name: ExEmElm.Decoder

values.name: field
values.comment:
Access the data contained in the children with a given tag, then decode it

Note that most of the decoders discard all but the first matching value
values.type: ExEmElm.Decoder.Node -> String -> (List String -> Result.Result e a) -> Result.Result e (a -> b) -> Result.Result e b

values.name: list
values.comment: Decode a list of the same structures
values.type: (a -> Result.Result e b) -> List a -> Result.Result e (List b)

name: ExEmElm.Encoder
comment:
This library stringifies XML data structures

@docs document, node

name: ExEmElm.Parser
comment:
This library allows the parsing of XML

@docs parse

values.name: parse
values.comment: Parses an XML document from a string

name: ExEmElm.Traverse
comment:
This library allows the traversal/querying of parsed XML

@docs innerText, at, textAt

values.name: at
values.comment: Traverse down a path of tags

values.name: innerText
values.comment: Retrives the text inside the node and all subnodes

values.name: textAt
values.comment: Get the text inside all tags at the end of the given path
